alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 10:38AM CDT until May 28 at 7:17PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Styx River Near Elsanor affecting Baldwin County. For the Styx River...including Elsanor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Styx River Near Elsanor. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Residents downstream at Seminole Landing should be alert to possible flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 3.8 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
